Paragraph: 15 This observation is in contrast to many conjugated polymers , in which there is a red - shift that occurs in going from the solution to the solid state due to the aggregation of the polymer chains in the solid state , 3,16 even the PCDTBT film is red - shifted by 30 nm vs solution.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PCDTBT |
| conjugated polymers (unspecified) |

Note: "PCDTBT" stands for Poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene):Poly(styrenesulfonate) and is a specific type of conjugated polymer.

Note: "occurs" and "happens" can be considered as implicit verbs and do not add new information about the material properties. "This observation" and "even" are also not material properties and have been removed.
